subject: Order #SSN1827
description_text:
Hi

I have just tracked my parcel for the PlusX pedals, order number: #SSN1827,
and it seems it is shipping from Hunan Province. I have attached a
screenshot below. I requested shipping from Germany warehouse and a member
of your team said they have seen the note requesting shipping from Germany
and they have informed the sales team.
I just want to make sure i will not have to pay import taxes into Europe as
that was something i did not want to do, i asked a member of your team
about this and they said that PlusX pedals are in stock in german
warehouse, and for me to make a note on the order requesting shipping from
German warehouse. I have done this but tracking the package seems like its
coming from China, Please help me clarify the situation.

Thank you
Mario

conversations.body_text: 你好，Mario Loureiro，  您好， 我们德国仓库将在未来几天收到一批 PlusX 产品。 一旦产品上市销售，我会及时通知您，您可以直接从我们的官方网站购买。 该产品无需缴纳任何关税，让您购买过程更加便捷。

Can you please update me when the plus X comes into stock?
Thank you

On Sat, 7 Jun 2025 at 01:09, service@simsonn.com

And also are the VAM PRO motor vibrators also available in the germany
warehouse?
Hi，Mario Loureiro，  PlusX 预计将于 15 日左右在德国仓库补货。 不过，VAM 和 VAM Pro 目前仅在中国仓库有售，且价格不含税。
Hi Mário Loureiro,    Our German warehouse now has PlusX pedals in stock. You can go ahead and place your order, and please add a note saying “Ship from Germany”.
Hi Mário Loureiro,  I just saw your note and have informed our sales team — they will arrange immediate shipping from Germany.

That's great, thank you very much.

On Tue, 24 Jun 2025 at 03:00, service@simsonn.com

Hi
I have just tracked my parcel and it seems it is shipping from Hunan
Province. I have attached a screenshot below. I requested shipping from
Germany warehouse.
Thank you
ID 号为 249, 705 和 750 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单249  
      主题: Shipping import tax question  
      描述:  Dear sirs I am looking to buy a set of plus x pedals. I live in Ireland and I recently saw in your official website a notice regarding product model reduction where you mentioned that costumes duties will be reduced. My question is if I order from your guys official website what country does the package come from (so i know whether i will have to pay EU import duties) and do the prices in the website include VAT? 
 Thanks for your help  
   
 Mario

合并来自工单705  
      主题: Plus X shipping info request  
      描述:  Dear sirs I just wanted to know whether the plus x pedals are in stock in the EU German warehouse? 
 Thank you

合并来自工单750  
      主题: Order #SSN1827  
      描述:  Dear sirs 
  I have just purchased the Plus X pedals, this is my order number: #SSN1827.
 
 I added a note in the shopping cart to "ship from the german warehouse" as i live in Ireland. However I can't see the note anywhere in the confirmation email or on the website in the orders page. Can you just confirm this will be shipped from Germany please. 
   
 Thank you  
 Mario

Hi Mário Loureiro,  We sincerely apologize. Although we had arranged for overseas shipping, the team mistakenly processed it as a domestic shipment. Since the package has already been loaded onto the plane, it cannot be canceled. However, please rest assured — if any customs duties are incurred, we will cover them in full.
